name: You’ll Own Nothing and Be Happy
description: $NOTHING (“You’ll Own Nothing and Be Happy”) is a memecoin built around one of the internet’s most persistent cultural flashpoints: the misinterpreted 2016 WEF “Welcome to 2030” design-fiction essay. The project reframes the phrase through satire and education, highlighting how a speculative scenario evolved into a meme, a conspiracy theory, and a symbol of real anxieties about ownership, digital rights, and consumer debt. The site functions as an accessible cultural explainer while the token expresses that narrative in crypto-native form.
